items.title: Awesome Selfhosted
items.content_text:
### Software / Automation

*   [Kibitzr](https://kibitzr.github.io) - Lightweight personal web assistant with powerful integrations. ([Source Code (‚≠ê684)](https://github.com/kibitzr/kibitzr)) `MIT` `Python`

### Software / Content Management Systems (CMS)

*   [Strapi](https://strapi.io/) - The most advanced open-source Content Management Framework (headless-CMS) to build powerful API with no effort. ([Source Code (‚≠ê68k)](https://github.com/strapi/strapi)) `MIT` `Nodejs`

### Software / File Transfer - Peer-to-peer Filesharing

*   [qBittorrent](https://www.qbittorrent.org/) - Free cross-platform bittorrent client with a feature rich Web UI for remote access. ([Source Code (‚≠ê32k)](https://github.com/qbittorrent/qBittorrent)) `GPL-2.0` `C++`

### Software / File Transfer - Web-based File Managers

*   [IFM (‚≠ê354)](https://github.com/misterunknown/ifm) - Single script file manager. `MIT` `PHP`

### Software / Software Development - IDE & Tools

*   [RStudio Server](https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/#Server) - Web browser based IDE for R. ([Source Code (‚≠ê4.8k)](https://github.com/rstudio/rstudio)) `AGPL-3.0` `Java/C++`

### Software / Wikis

*   [Pepperminty Wiki (‚≠ê200)](https://github.com/sbrl/Pepperminty-Wiki) - Complete markdown-powered wiki contained in a single PHP file. ([Demo](https://starbeamrainbowlabs.com/labs/peppermint/build/)) `MPL-2.0` `PHP`
items.content_html:
Software / Automation

  • Kibitzr - Lightweight personal web assistant with powerful integrations. (Source Code (‚≠ê684)) MIT Python

Software / Content Management Systems (CMS)

  • Strapi - The most advanced open-source Content Management Framework (headless-CMS) to build powerful API with no effort. (Source Code (‚≠ê68k)) MIT Nodejs

Software / File Transfer - Peer-to-peer Filesharing

  • qBittorrent - Free cross-platform bittorrent client with a feature rich Web UI for remote access. (Source Code (‚≠ê32k)) GPL-2.0 C++

Software / File Transfer - Web-based File Managers

  • IFM (‚≠ê354) - Single script file manager. MIT PHP

Software / Software Development - IDE & Tools

  • RStudio Server - Web browser based IDE for R. (Source Code (‚≠ê4.8k)) AGPL-3.0 Java/C++

Software / Wikis

  • Pepperminty Wiki (‚≠ê200) - Complete markdown-powered wiki contained in a single PHP file. (Demo) MPL-2.0 PHP

items.title: Awesome Ros2
items.content_text:
### Packages / Application layer

*   [system-modes (‚≠ê47)](https://github.com/micro-ROS/system_modes) - System modes for ROS 2 and micro-ROS.

### Packages / Middleware

*   [Micro XRCE-DDS Agent (‚≠ê134)](https://github.com/eProsima/Micro-XRCE-DDS-Agent) - Micro XRCE-DDS Agent acts as a server between DDS Network and Micro XRCE-DDS Clients.
*   [Micro XRCE-DDS Agent docker](https://hub.docker.com/r/eprosima/micro-xrce-dds-agent/) - Docker image containing the Micro XRCE-DDS Agent.
*   [Micro XRCE-DDS Client (‚≠ê147)](https://github.com/eProsima/Micro-XRCE-DDS-Client) - Micro XRCE-DDS implements a client-server protocol to enable resource-constrained devices (clients) to take part in DDS communications.
*   [micro-ROS-Agent (‚≠ê136)](https://github.com/micro-ROS/micro-ROS-Agent) - ROS 2 package using Micro XRCE-DDS Agent.

### Packages / Driver layer

*   [micro-ROS/hardware](https://github.com/micro-ROS/hardware) - Information and documentation about the hardware platforms used and supported in the micro-ROS project.
items.content_html:
Packages / Application layer

  • system-modes (‚≠ê47) - System modes for ROS 2 and micro-ROS.

Packages / Middleware

  • Micro XRCE-DDS Agent (‚≠ê134) - Micro XRCE-DDS Agent acts as a server between DDS Network and Micro XRCE-DDS Clients.
  • Micro XRCE-DDS Agent docker - Docker image containing the Micro XRCE-DDS Agent.
  • Micro XRCE-DDS Client (‚≠ê147) - Micro XRCE-DDS implements a client-server protocol to enable resource-constrained devices (clients) to take part in DDS communications.
  • micro-ROS-Agent (‚≠ê136) - ROS 2 package using Micro XRCE-DDS Agent.

Packages / Driver layer

  • micro-ROS/hardware - Information and documentation about the hardware platforms used and supported in the micro-ROS project.
